dan_start_01_sitappa_01:
Heads up, gang! Some jumped-up kid has
wandered in thinking [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she can raid our base!\c
Clearly [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she doesn’t know who [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she’s messing with.
Let’s teach h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]imer a lesson [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she won’t forget![VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_start_01_sitappa_02:
To our unwanted guest—if you can defeat [VAR NUM2(0002)] of
our Pokémon in the next [VAR NUM2(0001)] minutes, our boss\r
might just honor you with an appearance![VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_start_02_sitappa_01:
Some kid lucked out beating one of our sister
squads, and now [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she thinks [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she can take us on!\c
Time to give h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]imer the boot, gang! Let’s show this
gate-crasher what Team Star can do![VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_start_02_sitappa_02:
And if you’re listening, gate-crasher, know this!\c
Unless you can beat [VAR NUM2(0002)] of our Pokémon in
[VAR NUM2(0001)] minutes, our boss won’t lift a finger to deal\r
with the likes of you![VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_start_03_sitappa_01:
Seems the folks behind Operation Star-FOOL
are finally making a move against our base!\c
You know what that means, gang! Time for us to
shine bright and avenge our teammates![VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_start_03_sitappa_02:
And hey, little intruder, just so you know...\c
If you’ve got the skills to defeat [VAR NUM2(0002)] of our
Pokémon in [VAR NUM2(0001)] minutes, our boss might deem\r
you worthy to meet in person! Heh, break a leg![VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_start_04_sitappa_01:
Code red! Code red! Operation Starfall alert!\c
Everyone, get into position and defend the boss
with all you got![VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_start_04_sitappa_02:
And rest assured, intruder—we’ll deal with you
without the boss’s help...\c
Unless you manage to beat [VAR NUM2(0002)] of our Pokémon
in [VAR NUM2(0001)] minutes, that is. Good luck with that![VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_start_05_sitappa_01:
Even the smallest stars can light up the sky when
they shine together as constellations!\c
We’re the last bastion of Team Star! Losing isn’t
an option![VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_start_05_sitappa_02:
Hey, kid—you listening? If you beat [VAR NUM2(0002)] of our
Pokémon in [VAR NUM2(0001)] minutes, we’ll call the boss out\r
to deal with ya! How’s that for hospitality?[VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_start_06_sitappa_01:
Watch out, gang—[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she’s back! That awful kid who
pummeled our crew to stardust![VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_start_06_sitappa_02:
The boss isn’t around anymore, but we’ll still
defend the base with everything we got![VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_lose_06_sitappa_01:
Sorry, Boss... We couldn’t protect the base...\c
Haven’t you had enough, kid? Just...go away
already.[VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_lose_06_sitappa_02:
Doesn’t matter if you keep raiding us like this—
we don’t have any more LP to give!\c
Go find some other base to pound into the dirt![VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_lose_06_sitappa_01b:
Sorry, Boss... We couldn’t protect the base...\c
Haven’t you had enough, kid? Just...go away
already.[VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_lose_06_sitappa_02b:
Doesn’t matter if you keep raiding us like this—
we don’t have any more LP to give!\c
Go find some other base to pound into the dirt![VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_win_06_sitappa_01:
Even if we beat you in battle, it’s not like that’ll
bring our boss back...\c
Just leave us alone, would ya?[VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_win_06_sitappa_01b:
Even if we beat you in battle, it’s not like that’ll
bring our boss back...\c
Just leave us alone, would ya?[VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_active_07_honooboss_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Well if it ain’t [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! You
here\r
for\r
a\r
battle\r
with\r
yours truly?[VAR 0114(001F)]
dan_active_07_honooboss_02:
Just browsin’, huh? What a drag. Come back an’
see me when you’re more fired up.[VAR 0114(001F)]
dan_start_07_honooboss_01:
Defeat [VAR NUM3(0002)] Pokémon in [VAR NUM2(0001)] minute[VAR NUMBRNCH(0001,0100)]s!\c
That’s a proper challenge worth getting fired up
for, yeah?[VAR 0114(001F)]
dan_start_07_honooboss_02: Hey, Schedar Squad! Y’all ready?! It’s GO TIME![VAR 0114(001F)]
dan_berforebtl_07_honooboss_01: All riiight, BRING IT! I’ll blow everythin’ sky high![VAR 0114(001F)]
dan_afterbtl_07_honooboss_01:
Gotta give praise where it’s due, [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0403)]mangirl.
That was lit.\c
Hasta la vistar... ☆[VAR 0114(001F)]
dan_win_07_honooboss_01:
Seems you beat the [VAR NUM3(0001)] target Pokémon in...
[VAR NUM3(0003)] minute[VAR NUMBRNCH(0003,0100)]s, [VAR NUM2(0004)] second[VAR NUMBRNCH(0004,0100)]s.\c
You get [VAR NUM6(0002,002C)] LP from me, then. And with
that, hasta la vistar! ☆[VAR 0114(001F)]
dan_win_07_honooboss_04:
Seems you beat the [VAR NUM3(0001)] target Pokémon in...
[VAR NUM3(0003)] minute[VAR NUMBRNCH(0003,0100)]s, [VAR NUM2(0004)] second[VAR NUMBRNCH(0004,0100)]s.\c
But you know you’ve been goin’ hard on my crew
and lettin’ the others off the hook, right?\r
For that, I’m cuttin’ your earnings to [VAR NUM6(0002,002C)] LP.[VAR 0114(001F)]
dan_after_07_honooboss_01:
I’m callin’ it quits for today. If you’re burnin’ to
challenge me again, come back tomorrow.[VAR 0114(001F)]
dan_lose_07_honooboss_01:
Man, I was hopin’ you’d show us some red-hot
battles... You barely even sizzled out there.[VAR 0114(001F)]
dan_active_07_akuboss_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Hey, it’s my old pal, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!
Lemme\r
guess—you’re\r
here\r
for a\r
battle,\r
right?[VAR 0114(0021)]
dan_active_07_akuboss_02:
Whoa, that’s actually kind of a bummer.
Come back whenever you wanna tango![VAR 0114(0021)]
dan_start_07_akuboss_01:
You gotta defeat [VAR NUM3(0002)] Pokémon in [VAR NUM2(0001)] minute[VAR NUMBRNCH(0001,0100)]s.
Should be a breeze with your skills![VAR 0114(0021)]
dan_start_07_akuboss_02:
All right, Segin Squad, time to take the stage!
Let the music play![VAR 0114(0021)]
dan_berforebtl_07_akuboss_01:
Thanks for answerin’ the call of the stage! I’ll
have you dancin’ to my tune in no time![VAR 0114(0021)]
dan_afterbtl_07_akuboss_01:
You turned my melody into a threnody... Can’t
say I’m too stoked about it, but nice work!\c
Hasta la vistar! ☆[VAR 0114(0021)]
dan_win_07_akuboss_01:
This time, you defeated [VAR NUM3(0001)] Pokémon in...
[VAR NUM3(0003)] minute[VAR NUMBRNCH(0003,0100)]s and [VAR NUM2(0004)] second[VAR NUMBRNCH(0004,0100)]s!\c
Here’s [VAR NUM6(0002,002C)] LP from me for your efforts.
Hasta la vistar! ☆[VAR 0114(0021)]
dan_win_07_akuboss_04:
This time, you defeated [VAR NUM3(0001)] Pokémon in...
[VAR NUM3(0003)] minute[VAR NUMBRNCH(0003,0100)]s and [VAR NUM2(0004)] second[VAR NUMBRNCH(0004,0100)]s!\c
But, yo, how ’bout you take on the other crews
sometime? You’re only gettin’ [VAR NUM6(0002,002C)] LP from\r
me till you do![VAR 0114(0021)]
dan_after_07_akuboss_01:
You think I got it in me for an encore right now?
I’m flattered, but that’s just not happenin’.\r
Save that energy for tomorrow, pal![VAR 0114(0021)]
dan_lose_07_akuboss_01:
Guess you were off your game, huh? Come
challenge us again when you’re back in form!\c
Like a li’l angry Pokémon usin’ Payback, you
know? That’s the mood I want from you![VAR 0114(0021)]
dan_active_07_dokuboss_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Good day, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]. Com’st
thou\r
to\r
spar\r
with me?[VAR 0114(0023)]
dan_start_07_dokuboss_01:
Thy goal is [VAR NUM3(0002)] Pokémon, to be defeated in the
span of [VAR NUM2(0001)] fleeting minute[VAR NUMBRNCH(0001,0100)]s.[VAR 0114(0023)]
dan_start_07_dokuboss_02:
Hark, Navi Squad, my knights o’th’ battle!
The time for feast and sport is upon us![VAR 0114(0023)]
dan_berforebtl_07_dokuboss_01:
Though I am grateful for thy coming here, be
warned—I shall spare thee no mercy! En garde![VAR 0114(0023)]
dan_afterbtl_07_dokuboss_01:
You came here to train, yet I am the one who
must learn from YOU. Magnificent!\c
Hasta la vistar, my good [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0406)]fellowlady! ☆[VAR 0114(0023)]
dan_win_07_dokuboss_01:
The defeat of [VAR NUM3(0001)] Pokémon by thy hand took...
[VAR NUM3(0003)] minute[VAR NUMBRNCH(0003,0100)]s and [VAR NUM2(0004)] second[VAR NUMBRNCH(0004,0100)]s precisely!\c
Take [VAR NUM6(0002,002C)] LP as a most deserved reward.
Hasta la vistar, my good [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0406)]fellowlady! ☆[VAR 0114(0023)]
dan_win_07_dokuboss_04:
The defeat of [VAR NUM3(0001)] Pokémon by thy hand took...
[VAR NUM3(0003)] minute[VAR NUMBRNCH(0003,0100)]s and [VAR NUM2(0004)] second[VAR NUMBRNCH(0004,0100)]s precisely!\c
But know this—a mere [VAR NUM6(0002,002C)] LP shall be thy
reward till thou darest to confront a crew aside\r
from mine own![VAR 0114(0023)]
dan_after_07_dokuboss_01:
I shall take no more challenges today. Return
on the morrow to battle again, should you wish.[VAR 0114(0023)]
dan_lose_07_dokuboss_02:
My subordinates have grown strong. I would

dan_active_07_fairyboss_01:

You’re\r
cool\r
to\r
battle\r
me, right?[VAR 0114(0020)]
dan_active_07_fairyboss_02:
Awww! Come on, it’s boring here without you
to keep me entertained![VAR 0114(0020)]
dan_start_07_fairyboss_01:
Let’s see if you can beat at least [VAR NUM3(0002)] Pokémon
in [VAR NUM2(0001)] minute[VAR NUMBRNCH(0001,0100)]s, shall we?[VAR 0114(0020)]
dan_start_07_fairyboss_02:
Ruchbah Squad—hop to it! Let’s get this show on
the road![VAR 0114(0020)]
dan_berforebtl_07_fairyboss_01:
Heh, you got guts. But so what? You’ll still be

dan_afterbtl_07_fairyboss_01:
Ugh, this sucks! I’ll beat you next time for sure...

Hasta la vistar! ☆[VAR 0114(0020)]
dan_win_07_fairyboss_01:

I guess you’ve earned yourself [VAR NUM6(0002,002C)] LP.
Hasta la vistar and all that... ☆[VAR 0114(0020)]
dan_win_07_fairyboss_04:
Looks like you defeated [VAR NUM3(0001)] Pokémon in...
Huh. Exactly [VAR NUM3(0003)] minute[VAR NUMBRNCH(0003,0100)]s, [VAR NUM2(0004)] second[VAR NUMBRNCH(0004,0100)]s.\c
But don’t keep beating the snot out of my crew
and none of the others, you jerk! For being\r

dan_after_07_fairyboss_01:
I’m gonna spend the rest of today fixing the

Go bother someone else till tomorrow![VAR 0114(0020)]
dan_lose_07_fairyboss_02:
I’m totally shook that you couldn’t even make it

Honestly...step up your game next time.[VAR 0114(0020)]

to\r

dan_active_07_kakutouboss_02: OK, gotcha! Come back whenever you want![VAR 0114(0022)]

dan_start_07_kakutouboss_02:
And Caph Squad—listen up! Get your heads in

dan_berforebtl_07_kakutouboss_01:
I’m always ready to battle! Let’s see if you can

Hasta la vistar! ☆[VAR 0114(0022)]

It seems you defeated [VAR NUM3(0001)] Pokémon in...
[VAR NUM3(0003)] minutes and [VAR NUM2(0004)] seconds.\c
I’d like you to test your skills against the other

I\r

your\r

There, all better. Eyes on the prize now—we need

dan_heal_neruke_03:
How goes the operation? Bring your Pokémon
here, and I’ll heal them up for you.[VAR 0114(001E)]
dan_heal_sitappa_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]’Sup, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]. Want me to
heal\r
your\r
Pokémon?[VAR 0114(001E)]

dan_system_03:
You’re in the middle of a Star Barrage! You can’t
leave the base now!
dan_target_score_1: Defeat [VAR NUM3(0001)] of Team Star’s Pokémon!
dan_target_score_2: Defeat [VAR NUM3(0001)] of the STC’s Pokémon!
dan_vending_machine_1:
You used Team Star’s vending machine to
refresh your party!
dan_lose_hint_honoo:
Yeaaah! Go us! We sure showed that gate-crasher
what’s what!\c
Good thing [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she didn’t drench our Fire-type
Pokémon with a team of Water types! Haha![VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_lose_hint_aku:
Wooo! That no-good intruder will think twice
before [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she messes with us again!\c
Lucky [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she didn’t whale on our Pokémon with the
Fighting- and Bug-type moves they’re so weak to![VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_lose_hint_doku:
Hooraaay! That intruder is good as gone!\c
We wouldn’t have got off so easy if [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she’d had a
team of Ground or Psychic types... Phew![VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_lose_hint_kakutou:
Woo-hoo! We sent that would-be raider scurrying
off with h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]iser tail between h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]iser legs!\c
I almost feel like telling h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]imer that our Pokémon
are super weak to Flying types... But I won’t![VAR 0114(002F)]
dan_lose_hint_fairy:
Waheeey! That intruder won’t be bothering us
again anytime soon!\c
Good thing [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she didn’t take on our Fairy-type
cuties with a team of Poison or Steel types![VAR 0114(002F)]

has\r
a\r
unique\r
way\r

to send out multiple Pokémon and have them\r
battle at the same time.[VAR 0114(001E)]
dan_tutorial_neruke_04:
If your Pokémon get[VAR NUMBRNCH(00FD,0001)]s low on health, come back
here and I’ll heal [VAR NUMBRNCH(00FD,0402)]itthem up for you.[VAR 0114(001E)]

dan_lose_end_01: You have no more Pokémon that can fight!
dan_lose_end_02: You were overwhelmed by your defeat!

Oh? It seems you can’t use the vending machine
right now!
dan_talk_06_sitappa01_a:
We’ll protect this base with all we got while the
boss is away!\c
If you wanna challenge us to a Star Barrage,
go on and ring the bell at the gates if you dare![VAR 0114(002F)]
